questions.text: What does the term PK mean?
Offside is when a player from the opposing team receives the ball when behind who?
The ball is kicked past the goal line by the attacking team (between goal post and corner flag). The kick taken by the other team is called a what?
When a player calls out 'square' to the player with the ball, the first player is where?
When the score is still tied at the end of a International Cup or National Finals game, a ________ takes place, involving a series of shots on goal. What is this called?
